title: 16 Day ban completed when will I earn chests again?
body: I was banned for being toxic. Though there are many who do far worse things than what I did I deserved the ban and that is all anyways I'm just curios of when I will have the ability to earn hextech crafting back.

replies.body: There isn't a specific time frame for those restrictions to be lifted. Essentially, you need to show consistent behavior improvement to be eligible for chests again, and any negativity can increase the duration of your reform period. Be sure to check out our page on [**Hextech Crafting Restrictions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions) for all the details.

Can you help me as well? I don't know how to post on red tracker because I have forgotten many things after being gone for five months if not more. But I have gotten 210$ worth of Rp to get unbanned after my account was left in the wrong hands. It took me a while to get all this too and it was really hard. I'm trying hard not to be sad or cry but the reply to my ticket was barely any help to me. The post I read by Riot said I could pay with Rp cards too.
Thanks for the help can I ask is there anyway to report somebody out of the end of game lobby I came across the most toxic trolling person today?

We prefer that you use the report button in the after match lobby, but if you weren't able to do that you can shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for that report. Make sure to include any screenshots you have of what happened, otherwise we may not be able to follow up on that report!
